name: Frankles.github.io
body:
Benjamin Allen | 331 19th Street E, Minneapolis MN 55404 | (612) 203-2737 | ben.lane.allen@gmail.com | www.linkedin.com/benjaminlallen	

Provide a high quality and productive client experience with a company and its employees serving a purpose closely tied to my passions and interests.



PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

COMCAST | St Paul, MN | 
08/2008 - Present | 
Customer Account Executive
*	Represent the company as front line representative, providing assistance and direction via phone for customers with complex technical, operational and billing issues related to Comcast's products. 
*	Expanded role through self-education and job performance to include coaching role for new hires and ongoing collaborative support for co-workers and supervisors 
*	Participated in several pilot projects, streamlining troubleshooting process and improving customers’ experience.

DIAMOND LAKE RENTAL | Minneapolis, MN | 
02/2002 – 08/2008 | 
Assistant Manager
*	Assisted customers over the phone and in person in finding the right equipment required for their tasks 
*	Trained customers and fellow staff in the proper and safe operation of all equipment  
*	Reorganized entire facility to create a more efficient use of space and a better visual appeal for customers 




SKILLS
> Microsoft Office, MS Project, Visio, Windows OS, Troubleshooting, Phone Skills, 65 wpm.




PROFICIENCIES
> HTML, CSS, PHP, Drupal, WordPress, Tumblr, Google Analytics, Java, Python, Photoshop, User Experience, Fundraising




EDUCATION

A.A.S. in Software Programming (2010 - Present) | 
Minneapolis Community and Technical College | Minneapolis Minnesota (GPA: 3.6)

A.A.S. in Sound Arts (2003 - 2007) | 
Minneapolis Community and Technical College | Minneapolis Minnesota (GPA: 3.8)





EXAMPLES

	Github: https://gitbut.com/frankles/frankles.github.io
	Tumblr: http://ypmmn.tumblr.com
	WordPress: http://tinyurl.com/bettywhitesMS
